name: ento
description: Simple, stateful, observable objects in JavaScript.

scripts.coverage: cp index.js index.js~; (jscoverage lib; mv lib lib~; mv lib-cov lib; jscoverage index.js; mv index-cov.js index.js; mocha -R html-cov > coverage.html); rm -rf lib index.js; mv lib~ lib; mv index.js~ index.js

author: Rico Sta. Cruz <hi@ricostacruz.com>
